posts.post_title: FS: Six Card Raw T206 Lot, includes Chance Yellow Portrait - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Some dupes from a recent BST purchase... Insured with delivery confirmation for $130.  Note that there is faint pencil writing on the back of the Maddox right above Piedmont.

Chance, Frank (Yellow Portrait)
Street, Gabby (Portrait)
Downs, Jerry
Arndt, Harry
Bergen, Bill (Catching)
Maddox, Nick

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/chanceLotB/web.jpg[/IMG]

Hi

I will take the lot for $130.

What forms of payment do you accept?  Check / paypal?
